issue.title: Paragraph Text is not supported

repository.name: lottie-android
repository.description: Render After Effects animations natively on Android and iOS, Web, and React Native

issue.body:
The DocumentData class does not seem to support the "sz" and "ps" properties, which are present for Paragraph Text.

As such, paragraph text is not rendered correctly.

issue.title: Text with newlines crashes Lottie

repository.name: lottie-android
repository.description: Render After Effects animations natively on Android and iOS, Web, and React Native

body:
Thanks!

Please note that Paragraph Text doesn't work correctly even for single line text as it justifies the text to the layer's origin as opposed to the Paragraph Text box.

Speaking of justification, it would be great to add support for that too (at least center and right).
Are there any news on this? It could be a very useful feature for us :)
@rogererill I haven't been able to find the time to make it happen. I would accept a PR though.
Hi @gpeal , Is this issue open? Can I start work on this?

issue.title: can lottie support for identifying text line breaks

repository.name: lottie-android
repository.description: Render After Effects animations natively on Android and iOS, Web, and React Native

issue.body: There are two lines of text in the ae text animation, but only one line is displayed on the lottie side, and the & character is not recognized.please tell me how to solve this problem?
